page.title: 17Employment
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT}within the area is mainly agricultural; farming providing some jobs other than family labour. Self- employed & small businesses include Spraying, Photography, Fencing, Car Repairs & Art. Weston Hall engages staff in both house & grounds. The Crown Inn provides part-time & seasonal labour. There is very low unemployment in the area; generally the employees are of longstanding & loyal to their employers, giving an excellent community spirit. The majority of the working population travel outside the area to work. Plessey at Towcester is a major employer, other people commute further afield. For commuters the chance of real country life after travelling is very appealling. Old houses & land provide privacy from near neighbours & peace from the outside world.
